attributes.action: not scrap plans for a British Referendum on a new European Treaty
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: We want Tony Blair to offer the British Public the right to have their say in whether britain signs up to the European Treaty. We do not want Tony Blair to agree to the basic ouline without holding a referendum as he recently told a group of European Newspapers.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
